definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: She felt sad that she was coming home empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 她感到难过，她回家两手空空。

sentences.english: And authorities doubt they are coming home empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 当局怀疑他们回家两手空空。

sentences.english: I don't have any more philosophical arguments up my sleeve on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 我已两手空空，拿不出什么哲学论调了。

sentences.english: The bird-catcher was forced to go home empty-handed and without his revenge.
sentences.chinese: 鸟类捕手被迫回家两手空空，没有他的报复。

sentences.english: After six weeks, they came back empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 六个星期过后，他们两手空空打道回府。

sentences.english: But Realmadrid one time counter-attacks successfully, we only end up to turn out to be penniless.
sentences.chinese: 可皇马一次反击成功，我们只落得个两手空空。

sentences.english: The empty-handed males were mostly unsuccessful at mating.
sentences.chinese: 两手空空的雄蜘蛛几乎都未成功交配。

sentences.english: Macquarie and Newbridge go away empty-handed, at least for now.
sentences.chinese: 麦格理和新桥两手空空地打道回府了，如此。

sentences.english: And what about the slew of males who come up empty-handed?
sentences.chinese: 对于两手空空的男性，性别的失衡意味着什么呢？

sentences.english: We searched hard but came up empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 我们努力搜索，却两手空空而归。

definition: to return empty-handed/to fail to win anything
to be all alone in the world
to return from a rewarding journey
to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
as empty as anything (idiom); completely bereft/to have nothing/vacuous/hollow/empty (argument, head etc)
not having anything at all (idiom); utterly lacking/without two sticks to rub together
to go home (in a ceremonial procession)/to return home
dull gray/gloomy/dejected/crestfallen/with one's tail between one's legs
